//: Fae blood causes hallucinations when drank by vampires, so it need its own EoC.
This is necessary for powers whose effect on NPCs is variable, since the jmath equations return the avatar's traits

effect.u_message: Your eyes gleam red momentarily as they drink in all available light.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to activate your gleaming eyes.

effect.u_message: Your eyes lose their reddish glint as the darkness rolls back in.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: You feel a momentary warmth as you channel stolen blood into your eyes.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to maintain your gleaming eyes.

effect.u_message: You feel a surge of power as blood floods your muscles.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to activate vigor mortis.

effect.u_message: Your muscles weaken as the stolen blood leaves them.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: You feel a momentary warmth as you channel stolen blood into your muscles.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to maintain your vigor mortis.

effect.u_message: You feel a surge of power as blood fortifies your flesh.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to activate sanguine resilience.

effect.u_message: Your muscles weaken as the stolen blood leaves them.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: You feel a momentary warmth as you channel stolen blood into your flesh.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to maintain your sanguine resilience.

effect.u_message: The scent of fresh blood fills your nostrils.  There is a human nearby.

false_effect.u_message: You do not smell any nearby human blood.

effect.u_message: Your veins pulse as your body pushes some of your blood reserves to exhaustion and early dissolution.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to recover any stamina.

effect.u_message: The children of the night tell you what features of the map are nearby.

false_effect.u_message: Without the ability to howl into the wilds of the night, there is no response.

effect.u_message: You hold tightly to your blood, preventing it from leaving your body.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to activate coagulant weave.

effect.u_message: Your blood flows more freely as your grip on it relaxes.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: You feel a momentary warmth as you maintain your grip on your stolen blood.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to maintain your coagulant weave.

effect.u_message: Blood suffuses your flesh, repairing any damage it comes across.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to heal your wounds.

effect.u_message: You begin dodging with preternatural agility.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to activate flow like blood.

effect.u_message: Your movements slow as your lose your preternatural avoidance.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: You feel a momentary warmth as you maintain your preternatural dodging.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to maintain your flow like blood.

effect.npc_message: You bare your fangs and hiss at your target.

false_effect.npc_message: You bare your fangs and hiss at your target.
You don't have enough blood to activate your predator's mien.

effect.u_message: Your fingers twist into sharp claws.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to activate your claws of the beast.

effect.u_message: Your fingers warp and twist as your claws vanish.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: You feel a momentary warmth as you maintain your sharp claws.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to maintain your claws of the beast.

effect.u_message: Your veins pulse as your body pushes some of your blood reserves to exhaustion and early dissolution.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to recover any mana.

false_effect.npc_message: You don't have enough blood to activate your hypnotic gaze.

effect.u_message: You movements accelerate to superhuman levels.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to activate blood-driven speed.

effect.u_message: Your speed returns to normal.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: You feel a momentary warmth as you maintain your superhuman speed.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to maintain your blood-driven speed.

effect.npc_message: You exert your predatory will on your target.

false_effect.npc_message: You don't have enough blood to attempt to cow the beast.

false_effect.u_message: You must be on diggable soil to sink into it.

effect.u_message: The earth parts beneath you and you sink down into the soil.

false_effect.u_message: You feel yourself rising until you stand in the clear air once again.

name: Torpor
desc: Thanks to your torpor you are healing and recovering quickly

effect.npc_message: You focus you gaze on your target's mind, attempting to take control of it.

false_effect.npc_message: You don't have enough blood to activate your dominating gaze.

effect.u_message: Your fingers lengthen as flaps of skin grow between them and as your legs shorten, you take to the air.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to transform into a bat.

effect.u_message: Your wings recede and you land on now-humanoid legs.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: Your nose pushes out into a muzzle as you fall forward on all fours and let out a snarl.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to transform into a wolf.

effect.u_message: Your fur disappears and you walk once again on two legs.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: Your body falls apart into billowing mist.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to transform into mist.

effect.u_message: You reconstitute yourself from the billowing mists.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to maintain your mist form.

if.message: Select door or window, then target the space beyond it.

else.u_message: You must be near a door or window to seep through.

//: Check if the vampire is underweight or lower for their size category.  If yes, consume some blood to increase their calories.  Conversion rate of 1 blood vitamin to 5 calories, in 500 calories chunks.
//2: 95000 Kcal is within the normal range for a medium-sized character for both short and tall.  This value is then multiplied or divided to account for the player's size category.  The following EOCs are listed according to the code's check order.

effect.u_message: Some of your stolen blood is consumed by your body, making it a little less gaunt.
Shadows surround you until only your now-glowing eyes remain visible.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to shroud yourself in shadow.

effect.u_message: Your eyes stop glowing and the shadows surrounding you dissipate.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough blood to maintain the shadows surrounding you.

//: This checks for that shape, and toggle it off if found.
This checks for that shape, and toggle it off if found.
This checks for that shape, and toggle it off if found.
This checks for that shape, and toggle it off if found.

This EOC is called when the player dies.  If the player has enough blood and this ability isn't in cooldown, it'll save their life and execute multiple effects.  If it can't trigger, the player dies as usual.

effect.u_message: As you are about to die, your body instinctively turns to mist before reappearing nearby with some of its wounds closed.

//: Ensure the trait properly activates when the ability triggers
Makes gaining last breath's mist without knowing mist form grants mist form instead.

effect.u_message: You feel that the anomalous energies of the storm would do quick work of any darkness you could summon, so you decide to not attempt to blot out the sun for now.

false_effect.u_message: Using your mastery over the Shadowed Path, you blot out the sun, covering the region around you in darkness for a short period of time.
You don't have enough blood to blot out the sun.

effect.u_message: The darkness you summoned fades away, clearing the sky.
